name: BlueHaikus
0:
”Alexa, open Blue Haikus.”
”Ask Blue Haikus to read me a poem.”
”Tell Blue Haikus to say a haiku.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: blue haikus
des: Listen to your daily dose of blue haikus. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
